title: How unlucky (or lucky) were you with your shop discounts

replies.body: At least you get something in your shop, i get nothing
Rito is trying to tell you something.. it involves a cow
I got three 60%s and a 70% but I ended up buying only one of the skins. Just goes to prove you can get the right discounts but if they aren't on the right skins it counts for nothing.
Unhappy with discount drop chances........... =/ Really! At least they give so many discounts and now they've already implemented that chest system too lol.
